heroText.HeroMainTextMarkTwo: I strive to create websites and applications that meet user needs and exceed their expectations.
heroText.HeroMainTextNoraml: , I focus on creating digital experiences that seamlessly blend creativity with functionality. With a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of web technologies,

firstProject.title: My Projects
firstProject.description: Such a website could be a unique tool that can make the cooking experience of its users special and interesting. Using recipe data and cooking principles loaded onto the site through machine learning technology, when users input their available ingredients, the system uses AI algorithms to suggest personalized and unique recipes

secoundProject.title: Client management app
secoundProject.description: A client management app for barbers can revolutionize the way barbershops operate, making client interactions smoother and more efficient. By leveraging machine learning and AI technology, the app can track client preferences, appointment histories, and hairstyle trends.

thirdProject.title: Client tracking app
thirdProject.semiTitle: Client tracking app for a samll bussiness
thirdProject.description: A client tracking app can be an invaluable tool for businesses looking to improve customer relationships and enhance service quality. Utilizing machine learning and AI technology, the app tracks customer interactions, purchase histories, and preferences.
